brewery.name: Suncatcher Brewing
brewery.description: Suncatcher Brewing is a craft brewery in Chicago.
brewery.service_info: Beer brewed in-house and served in 20 oz imperial pints, 12 oz sessions, and 5 oz tasters

beers.name: American Bitter
beers.description: Pale malt and c-20, ID Chinook, WA Columbus and Cascade…There’s a feeling I get, when I look to the west (Led Zeppelin)

beers.name: Suncatcher DraftsBeer brewed in-house and served in 20 oz imperial pints, 12 oz sessions, and 5 oz tastersRye Lager 4.9% ABV
beers.description: Suncatcher DraftsBeer brewed in-house and served in 20 oz imperial pints, 12 oz sessions, and 5 oz tasters

beers.name: Rye Lager 4.9% ABV
beers.description: Balanced foundation of pale barley malt with pineapple, berry and resin from MI grown nugget, chinook and cashmere hops...Headed out to where the pavement turns to sand (Neil Young)

beers.name: IPA
beers.description: Beer brewed in-house and served in 20 oz imperial pints, 12 oz sessions, and 5 oz tasters
